item.description:
Drink Eggnog, Listen to live local band, raise money for a local children's charity and hang out with your friends, the Providence Newcomers!

From the Nogfest Facebook Event:

Celebrating 5 Years of nogalicious debauchery, Sound and Fury Productions RI presents Nogfest 2010.

For those who aren't in the know, Nogfest is an annual eggnog drinking contest held to raise money for The Tomorrow Fund, a local charity based in Providence, RI that helps and supports children with cancer and their families. Last year, they were able to raise $1,200 aiming to double that this year!

Nogfest features live music from local artists. This year's musical lineup features:

Islands In Motion
14 foot 1
Full Void

Entry is $6.
item.how_to_find_us: Call me to coordinate location, phone number provided when you RSVP.
item.name: Nogfest 2010
